Name: the LAST LETTER
About the game: The Last Letter is a VR Narrative Puzzle Game. An enigmatic letter of your girlfriendâ€™s Grandma accompanying an antique board game will lead you to the discovery of a mysterious and fantastic new world. Together, you will follow the path of her Grandma on a quest to find the meaning of the game she sent you. Magical creatures and your ability to lead them will help you to solve the puzzles standing on your way. The game is entirely dubbed in English, Japanese and Chinese.
